# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than $100. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I'm offering it at an exclusive price of $95. This is a special offer tailored just for you, considering its value to you is estimated at $80. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly exceptional! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
